overview: Ilan Abehassera is a 29 year-old bright Internet and Mobile Entrepreneur with strong skills in Business Development, Marketing and User Interfaces. He has previously managed 2 early stage startups in the Internet Space in 2006 (FrenchNetwork.com, a Social Network for French Expatriates), and in the Mobile Space in 2007 (ClickOVA, a mobile backup solution). Lately, he took over the US Operations of a famous European Venture Backed StartUp called ZLiO.com in 2008, and lead their Biz Dev efforts. You can find his various interviews at netvibes.com/ilan, and his recommendations on his LinkedIn profile. Ilan is 100% committed to the success of Producteev, and works full time for the company since July 2008.
